sentence.Network_en: She studied him for the longest time, looking wryly amused.
sentence.Network_cn: 她面带苦笑，盯着他看了很长时间。

sentence.Network_en: We were amused to see how assiduously the animal groomed its fur.
sentence.Network_cn: 看着这只动物如此认真地梳理自己的毛，我们被逗乐了。

sentence.Network_en: Having pictures to colour will keep children amused for hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 有画可用来涂色会让孩子们玩很长时间。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语第二册学习笔记 ... have a difficult time: 日子不像平时那样惬意 amused: 感到好笑的 interesting: 一般有意思.
英语词汇-情感_百度文库 ... amorous 多情的 amused 愉快的 angry 愤怒的.
新视野第四册单词 - 豆丁网 ... amuse vt. 使开心，使发笑 amused a. 被逗乐的；愉快的 heave vt. （用力）举；拉；推.
开心的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... 如此开心 So Happy 开心的 amused；Alan；happy；glad 穷开心 Shiny Happiness；DjayanMix；Dt…

list.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... fair 市场 amusement park 游乐园 ghost train 魔鬼列车.
... 1. space museum 太空博物院 2. amusement park 游乐场 3. water park 水上乐园.
建筑专业英语名词 - 豆丁网 ... amplitude of vibration 振幅 amusement center 娱乐中心 amusement park 公共游乐场.
原因非常简单:为了逃避娱乐税(Amusement Tax)的缴纳。这一税收始于魏玛共和国时期。当时,如果在放映一部未经电影审查委员会定级的故事片之前加映一部已经评级的.
从零开始学语法：一起来学反身代词_英语网 ... for oneself 替自己 amuse oneself 自娱自乐 help oneself to 随便吃.

entry.def: If you are amused by something, it makes you want to laugh or smile.

example.ex: Sara was not amused by Franklin's teasing...
example.tran: 被富兰克林揶揄之后，萨拉的脸上全无笑意。

example.ex: We were amused to see how assiduously the animal groomed its fur.
example.tran: 看着这只动物如此认真地梳理自己的毛，我们被逗乐了。

entry.def: If you keep someone amused, you find things to do which stop them getting bored.

example.ex: Having pictures to colour will keep children amused for hours...
example.tran: 有画可用来涂色会让孩子们玩很长时间。

example.ex: Archie kept us amused with his stories.
example.tran: 阿奇一直给我们讲故事来逗我们开心。

auth_sentence.content: His conversation amused me, in the dining room.
auth_sentence.res_content: His conversation amused me, in the dining room.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His conversation amused me, in the dining room.

auth_sentence.content: I would be amused if it were not so important.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would be amused if it were not so important.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would be amused if it were not so important.

auth_sentence.content: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.
auth_sentence.res_content: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Richards says, with his wolfy grin, wholly amused.

Sentence.sentence: Similarly, those who are able to view the world with amused tolerance are often equally forgiving of their own shortcomings.

sentences.cn: 她看上去有点被逗乐了。

sentences.en: She seemed greatly amused by his jokes.
sentences.cn: 她似乎被他的笑话逗得很开心。

sentences.en: She wore on her face an amused look.
sentences.cn: 她脸上带着顽皮的神情。

sentences.en: Playing with water can keep children amused for hours.
sentences.cn: 嬉水能让孩子们开开心心玩好几个小时。
